attributes.action: T Catagorically state, that Britain, (England) is a Christian Country and will remain so.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have seen, day after day, the eradication of our Christian Heritage, we, the People of the UK, we, the people of Britain, are asking the PM, if he can, to state, that this very Isle, is Christian, will be, and forever be Christian. The people of this very Isle are demanding it,  his failure to acknowledge this request, is a monumental denial of our very being and beliefs. This country is ours, not foreign peoples, but OURS. Cannot he see the demise of our very being, our up-bringing, our very own heritage. The right are waiting, let labour play into their hands.
This petition has been mailed to all of the main tabloids. Let the government deny the peoples of this Isle a vote. Political suicide.
